response.message: Let me know if you need help with the Bitcoin integration. Of course, there *is* an SE for that ;)
what will be bitcoins used for?

Good points about what you learned about the translation/I18n/L10n - we went through a lot of that.  We ended up with a web app which in house user/translators used to translate within itself (everything was database based) and immediately see the results.  Phrases with insertion points are always a pain.  I wish .NET supported commenting in formatting strings like I asked three years ago: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1461747/net-formatting-strings-good-practices-for-commenting.
